org.apache.sis.referencing.operation.AbstractCoordinateOperation

Packages that use AbstractCoordinateOperation
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.referencing.operation
Relationship between any two Coordinate Reference Systems (CRS).

  • Uses of AbstractCoordinateOperation in org.apache.sis.referencing.operation

    Subclasses of AbstractCoordinateOperation in org.apache.sis.referencing.operation
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DefaultConversion
    A parameterized mathematical operation that converts coordinates to another CRS without any change of datum.
    class 
    DefaultPassThroughOperation
    Specifies that a subset of a coordinate tuple is subject to a specific coordinate operation.
    class 
    DefaultTransformation
    A parameterized mathematical operation that transforms coordinates to another CRS with a change of datum.
